summary: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.
cast: Stan Collymore|Sharon Stone|Neil Maskell|David Thewlis|Jan Chappell|David Morrissey|Terence Harvey|Hugh Dancy|Ellen Thomas|Mark Sangster|Tim Berrington|Indira Varma|Charlotte Rampling|Heathcote Williams|Flora Montgomery|Kata Dobó|Iain Robertson|Charlie Simpson|Daniele Lydon|Christopher Brand|Charlotte Purton|Adam Allfrey|Vee Vimolmal|Simon Lenagan|Clair Tebbut|Aisling O'Neill|Alex Argenti|Andy Callaghan|Susan Christie|Robert Clarke|Robyn Cooper|Scott Davidson|Robert Dearle|Ross Donnelly|Timo Gilbert|Martin Heathcote|Keith How|João Costa Menezes|Shane Nolan|Peter Rnic|André Schneider|Tina Simmons|Peter Smith|Alexandra Staden
title: Instinto básico 2. Adicción al riesgo
